title: My side of the mountain. [Edited version]
creator_credit: James B. Clark, Robert B Radnitz and Paramount Communications
brief_description: An edited version of the film based on children’s book by Jean George. Relates the experiences of a 13 year old boy as he learns about survival and independence in a mountain wilderness.
